title: If there is no data for a series, a friendly error message should be displayed
description: When creating a chart and selecting a column that has no data, no error message is shown.
OB: When selecting a column without data, there is no friendly error message displayed.
EB: When selecting a column without data, a friendly error message should be displayed, informing the user that there is no data available for the selected column.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a chart.
2. Set the data definition.
3. Select a column that does not contain any data.
